title: thoughts on death sworn zed skin
body:
overall looks good, especially the particles. but for the love of god please fix his chicken legs it bothers me a lot
also can we just have normal 2 claws? the wolverine claws look too bunched together and are struggling to fit on his model they look really out of place i think itll look better if he just had 2 claws or one like in his championship but good job nonetheless will def be buying.
